submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
            horizontalCut.sort(reverse=True)
            verticalCut.sort(reverse=True)

            hcur = 1
            vcur = 1
            ans = 0
            hidx = 0
            vidx = 0

            while hidx < m-1 and vidx < n-1:
                if horizontalCut[hidx] >= verticalCut[vidx]:
                    ans += horizontalCut[hidx] * vcur
                    hcur += 1
                    hidx += 1
                else:
                    ans += verticalCut[vidx] * hcur
                    vcur += 1
                    vidx += 1

            while hidx < m-1:
                ans += horizontalCut[hidx] * vcur
                hidx += 1

            while vidx < n-1:
                ans += verticalCut[vidx] * hcur
                vidx += 1

            return ans
